resources.string: Locked Folder is a secure folder for your images and videos on this device.\nThe secured media is never uploaded anywhere and is always on-device, encrypted with a key unique to your device\'s password or fingerprint data.
The secured data cannot be restored if the password was forgotten or the fingerprint was removed.

v0.9.5:
- Added animation to double tap to zoom and reset in horizontal photo views
- Added custom albums (non folder based)
- Added item count to album info dialog
- Fixed editing view text zooming
- Fixed jank in default tab reordering
- Added toggle switch for photo copy dates
- Fixed issue where drawing with paint after blur would cause a crash in editing view
- Text scaling/rotating/moving doesn't suck anymore
- Fixed tap to draw not working (used to always show up in top left corner, now works normally)
- Color contrast improvements for bottom bar items in editing view
- Added ability to resize and change color of already set text in editing view (tap on text to select it)
- Added ability to zoom in editing view paint mode
- Increased editing view blur brush radius (more blurring)

v0.9.4:
- Fixed icon colors for main bars
- Added export favourites to zipfile or folder
- Fix videoplayer doubletap to skip not correctly changing direction in case of quicktaps
- Made paths horizontally scrollable in path-displaying views
- Added sort mode customizer
- Fixed check for update on startup running multiple times
- Added snackbars for editing failure and success
- Add confirm to delete toggle
- Fixed trash not always sorting by most recently trashed
- No more missing files if user moves or copies and exits view
- Finished album info implementation
- Added icons for confirm to delete\, media sorting\, and check for updates
- Fixed videoplayer doubletap to seek showing underneath other UI
- Code cleanup and improvement
- Added ability to send previous run's logs
- Videoplayer doubletap to skip now only needs doubletap on initial try and then its single tap to skip
- Autodetect albums now adds albums as it finds them
- Fixed irrecoverable secured item issue if it's associated album is removed from lavender photos
- Added bulk encrypting photos from search page
- Fix doubletap to skip blocking other UI
- Added exif data eraser
- Added basic blur tool in editing view for android 12 and above
- Added exit on save toggle for editing view
- Fixed secure folder ghost media issue
- Securing media loading dialog no longer disappear with app bars while media is still being secured

v0.9.3:
- Use stable identifiers for drawables
- Add update info notice
- Added option to disable check updates on startup
- Added fully customizable tabs
- Entirely rework migration logic
- Unified dialog colors
- Fix mediastore not refreshing correctly
- Better media size display
- Add export secure folder to zip file

v0.9.2:
- Fixed erroneous crash in horizontal image list
- Fixed updater view not showing progress
- Fixed updater not installing packages
- Fixed move copy to albums list not showing thumbnails
- Fixed alignment and overflow issues with single album dialogs
- Added data and backup
- Migration to encrypted photos is no longer broken
- Added default tab customization

v0.9.1:
- Fix dialog info for secured media
- Better drag to select behaviour
- Fixed add albums from debugging settings
- Added custom album sorting
- Much faster album loading
- Dynamic album reordering so last modified albums are on top
- Added automatic album detection
- Added Lavender Snackbars to app
- Better migration to encrypted secure folder
- Double tap to skip is now supported in videoplayer
- Misc performance improvements

v0.9.0:
- Load file metadata into info dialog after decryption
- Added in-app updater
- Reworked entire media loading system to allow for multiple albums to be loaded
- Added \+ icon to album grid view top bar
- Fixed lag spike when opening an album
- Extreme optimizations and performance gains
- Fix loading dialogs for encryption and decryption
- Fix secure folder thumbnails not always loading
- Fix possible security flaw due to glide caching secured images
- Videoplayer no longer pauses music if its muted
- Added loading screen for encrypted videos
- Unified selecting top bar
- Fixed isPreV083 behaviour
- Fixed open with view not being open withable
- Don't forever hang if clicking move to secure folder from selecting top bar while list is empty
- Finally fixed android 11 and 12 boot issues

v0.8.9:
- Added AES encryption for secured photos
- Added error icon for manual add path
- Fix loading screen on secure folder
- Fixed elements in light theme not being consistent and cohesive
- Video player remembers last mute state
- Added landscape friendly views for secure folder and permission screen
- Added open with Lavender Photos
- Removed alternative pick albums
- Added loading dialogs for actions that take time

v0.8.8:
- Removed MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission
- Reworked entire file handling system
- Changed main app top bar animation
- Improved performance
- Fixed issues with securing media items
- Fixed scrolling lagginess
- Fixed favourites view crashing when tapping an item
- Fixed porting previous albums from v0\.8\.3 to higher versions
- Make explanation dialogs consistent
- Stop app from freezing when loading albums with files other than images
- Fix log saving\, restructure app folders
- Added file sharing from secure folder
- Note\: Please delete the Lavender Photos folder from Internal Storage

v0.8.7-Hotfix:
- Fix search not displaying correct items
- Exoplayer no longer shuts off after background-ing the app
- Better logcat behaviour
- Fixed permission screen UI
- Added multiple ways of adding albums until a better way is found
- Fixed crash when photogrid is empty
- MUCH faster drag to select with better behaviour

v0.8.7:
- Fix videoplayer crashing after playing multiple videos in a row
- Touch lock no longer gets stuck if app switches to portrait mode
- Add video autoplay setting
- Add video mute on startup setting
- Set icons for settings that were using placeholders
- Added app theme selector
- Add default album list for first app launch
- Clarified Manage All Files permission purpose
- Add highlights and color tint adjustments in editing view
- Add mini privacy policy statement
- Add image filters in editing view
- New option to overwrite by default when editing
- Added drag to select in photo grids
- Animate select checkmark
- In video player app bars now only show when clicking the more options button\, no more annoying click and double click

v0.8.6:
- Completely refactored datastore for MUCH better performance and scalability
- Added trash bin auto delete interval settings
- Fix possible crash on android 11 devices when trying to hide app bars
- Fixed photo sharing in secure folder
- Enhanced settings look
- Faster empty folder checks\, app will feel slightly faster
- Fixed video resolution info
- Added thumbnail size and cache settings
- Added clear thumbnail cache setting
- Fixed landscape behaviour for main page
- Fixed jitter when switching pages in main screen
- Folders that don't contain images or videos won't be stuck on loading forever now
- Fixed Manage All Files permission button not working
- Added explanations to permissions
- Secured photos now maintain their original date and other info


v0.8.5:
- Fix videoplayer completely refetching data when changing orientation
- Move/Copy popup doesn't go past statusbar now
- Secure folder locks when leaving the app temporarily
- Fixed inaccessible folders even if they exist
- SinglePhotoView photo list now updates dynamically to match present media
- Fixed brightness adjustment and added whitepoint adjustment
- Landscape videoplayer now has lock touch option
- Videoplayer controls automatically hide after 5 seconds
- Videoplayer will resume playback after exiting and reentering app

v0.8.4:
- Fix permission handling
- Better and faster media queries
- Add random search bar placeholders
- More readable date taken for photos
- Added settings for permissions and debugging with logs

v0.8.3:
- Fixed wrong behaviour when album name contains a comma
- Properly trash and delete media with content resolver
- Added value indicator for adjustments slider in editing view
- Add option to overwrite instead of save a new copy for edits
- Check if not media manager and delete stuff properly too
- Fix not being able to un-trash files when app is media manager
- Newly edited photos now show up in system normally
- Editing view adjustment actually take effect now (oups)

v0.8.2:
- Added contrast/brightness/saturation adjustments to editing view
- Added blackpoint and warmth (color temperature) adjustments to editing view

v0.8.1:
- Fixed favourite view excessive top padding
- Fixed crash when loading or unloading HorizontalImageList and media changes
- Fixed crash when adding new albums that already where added
- Fixed video playback not resetting to 0 when reaching end
- Fixed video playback sometimes only going to one second less than the video duration
- Added rotating and resizing text by gestures in editing view
- Fix search page resetting scroll position when viewing an image

v0.8.0:
- Cropping added
- Added cropping ratios
- Better save and undo functionality

v0.7.9:
- Fix erroneous scaling when rotating images in editing view
- Fix video autoplay when changing orientation
- Fix videoplayer seekbar time not always going to end
- Fix videoplayer current and end times being slightly off

v0.7.8:
- All the below changes are in editing view
- Added drawing on images
- Added drawing text on images
- Added rotating images
- Added size change for drawing and text
- Added color change for drawing and text
- Make editing view usable in landscape mode

v0.7.7:
- Minor update better showing of new images in albums view

v0.7.6:
- Fixed animation and spacing on copy or move dialog
- Fixed spacing on favourties view

v0.7.5:
- Added editing view (no functionality)
- Added proper zooming/panning/rotating

v0.7.3:
- Added info dialogs in secure folder and trash
- Intelligent album sorting
- Search by date added
- Close data streams after exiting a page
- Fixed today and yesterday tags in photo grid
- Secured items now go back to original place
- Fixed dates in secure folder (were broken showing everything as if it were secured today)
- Fixed resolution not showing on all media

v0.7.2:
-Complete rework of delete/copy/move/trash system
- Trash interoperates with rest of system now
- Much more fluidity to grids
- Albums no longer show photos from subfolders
- Performance improvements and quality of life stuff

v0.7.0:
- Search improvements
- Copy and move added in selection
- Speed improvements to large selection deletion/restoration
- Smoother transitions to selecting in views with no bottom bar

v0.6.9:
- Added favouriting media
- Improved scrollbars behaviour
- Sort secure folder by recency
- Lots of code cleanup and misc performance improvements
- General responsiveness improvements
- Fixed navigation bar colors in light mode
- Proper icons and dialogs for actions
- Selection available in every gridview
- Videoplayer experience is better

v0.6.6
- Added scrollbars to grids
- Major performance improvements
- Added selecting items from grid
- Fix lag when showing bottom bars
- Can clear trash bin now
- Infinitely faster search
- Fix single photo view resetting on rotation change
- Fix search not allowing selection
